analysis.key_quote: I am commenting to staunchly oppose this initiative, and emphasize not only how detrimental it will be to research under NIH grants, but, in a broader sense, the incredibly harmful impact it will have on academic integrity as a whole.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the initiative and highlights concerns about its detrimental effects on research and academic integrity, which aligns with themes of politicization and scientific integrity.
